Package com.attendace.controller

Class AttendanceController

java.lang.Object
com.attendace.controller.AttendanceController
public class AttendanceController extends Object
Controller for managing attendance-related operations. Provides methods to add, update, remove, and retrieve attendance records.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    AttendanceController()
    Constructs a new AttendanceController and initializes the handler.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • addAttendance

      public boolean addAttendance(int courseId, int userId, int staffId, boolean attendanceStatus, int currentAttendance)
      Adds a new attendance record with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the ID of the course
      userId - the ID of the user
      staffId - the ID of the staff member
      attendanceStatus - the attendance status (present or not)
      currentAttendance - the current attendance count
      Returns:
      true if the attendance was added successfully, false otherwise

    • getAttendance

      public List<String> getAttendance()
      Retrieves attendance records.
      Returns:
      a list of attendance data fields

    • getAllAttendance

      public List<String> getAllAttendance()
      Retrieves all attendance records.
      Returns:
      a list of all attendance data fields

    • updateAttendance

      public boolean updateAttendance(int value, String label, String setValue)
      Updates an attendance record with the specified value, label, and new value.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to identify the attendance record
      label - the label (column) to identify the attendance record
      setValue - the new value to set
      Returns:
      true if the attendance was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • removeAttendance

      public boolean removeAttendance(int value, String label)
      Removes an attendance record based on the specified value and label.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to identify the attendance record
      label - the label (column) to identify the attendance record
      Returns:
      true if the attendance was removed successfully, false otherwise
